conbody.p: This DLL implements certificate validation according to the PKIX Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) profile. Given a set of certificates supplied by a third party, and a local store of trusted root certificates, the Certificate and Key Management component will attempt to validate the identity of the third party. Two public classes are defined here:

li.p: CPKIXValidationResult — encapsulates the result of the validation operation.
